content.detailedDescription: Heading 694 from oakdale towards woodbury and thought i was seeing an orange colored orb in the distance. it disapeared, whatever. i rounded the bend around fleetfarm and saw on the horizon a violet colored orb stationary above the highway 5 overpass. it was about 500 feet above the ground. it then passed directly over the top of me in the northbound direction moving very fast. i couldn't stop to see it. never seen this color orb in the sky before. pretty cool.
content.summary: Violet colored orb 694 and hwy 5 oakdale

content.detailedDescription:
Two grandsons and i had moved blowup mattress's to my back deck to watch the international space station pass and the display of the perseid meteor shower.  it was supposed to be spectacular, but observed only about 5 remarkable shooting stars. the boys were asleep after midnight.  i noticed flashes of light from the other side of the house....This was between 12:30pm and 1 am.  i could not see what was making the flashes.  as i was still sitting up, a very very slow square or diamond shaped object was passing over the house roof headed directly north.  (we are 5 miles from the canadian border) it was huge.  a large blinking light in the front, 3 bright steady lights in back as it passed over.  i tried to awaken the oldest 11 year old but could not. the object almost seemed to float and was so low that it was hard to grasp how huge it was. it just disappeared over the trees of my neighbors.

it was in the morning that i started sketching what it looked like.  i realized that for something that big and that low, it should have made a horrific sound.  no sound. i knew then, it was something i had never seen.

the next night, i was sketching the object on a napkin for my sister when the waitress walked by and said she had seen the same object, but years ago. she said "i seen that same object while driving home.  my friend and i pulled over and about 6 other cars going in the opposite direction pulled over and they all watched it" that gave me the validation that i seen something remarkable.

she said she watched the papers for some article of an usual object as i had also done the next morning.  i also called the local police and sheriffs office who directed me to faa.  the faa had no option for reporting unusual aircraft. what is amazing to me is that nothing was in the papers.  

during the fly over of the object, i was awestruck. i knew that whatever i had seen was remarkable.  trying to get my grandson awake was frustrating as i knew this was something so unusual.  i was not scared during the time it went over head, nor any bad feelings the next day.  i actually felt privileged to have seen it.
content.summary: A short encounter of a huge, low flying diamond/square object with one flashing light and 3 steady lights.  no noise, effortless flight.

content.detailedDescription: El dia y hora senalado me encontraba en la azotea de mi domicilio cuando observe este objeto que no pude identificar que venia de este a oeste y encontrandose a pocos metros de mi azotea se desvia rodeando tres antenas de comunicacion quedandose junto a la ultima por unos minutos para despues dirigirse en direccion suroeste,sin emitir sonido alguno.Siendo fotografiado y filmado con mi celular samsung de 8mp.
content.summary: Objeto oscuro al parecer cilindrico a simple vista

content.detailedDescription:
#1-i was looking for shooting stars. #2-i was using my camera to see if it could zoom in on anything that may be out there because i did see a ufo the last time when i was looking to see mars when it had come closest to the earth i think the date was 2014.
#3-i had thought the object was a "quad copter" with a type of arm extended out of the bottom of the craft. 
#4-the object looked like a quad copter or the space station because it was very high in the sky and i had a lot of difficulty finding it and it must have been moving because i had a hard time finding it and trying to lock on to it to click a picture of it. 
#5-i remember feeling excited but was then upset that i could not find it anymore.
#6-i was using a small digital still camera and it was hard to keep on it and being that you can only see the object with the camera and not your eye's it is even harder to find it with just the little camera that i have. i was very lucky just to capture it at all.
content.summary: Looked like a space stasuon with a arm out the bottom and claw at the end of the arm.

content.detailedDescription: I have filled a previous report with u.My report info is missing..... so i am filling another and new one, please call when convenient, k. m.
content.summary: I have a picture. this is 6th sighting in my area. news paper articles, k.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend were waiting outside at my mother's house for a friend around 10pm at night. we were sitting inside the jeep as it was quite cool out and we didn't know when they where going to show up. 
we were sitting there and out our front windshield we seen a huge triangular shape just over the top of the jeep decending upwards.
it appeared to look very much like a large metallic pyramid, it was literally like being in a movie or one of those simulation rides.
it was bronze  looked like it was made out of copper almost but not shiny plates but had ridges and lines. inside of the center was an orange light. ( the ones i usually see in the sky spining/wavering around up high in the sky)
so i figure it makes sense that the light going around in the bottom is the ships main source of power. 
i had seen so many way up in the sky and other occurrences in my life that i was so happy and amazed with what i had just seen.
i'm fainted by them have been always it's become a fixation in a way.
i'm sure there's good and bad like there is in everything but i didn't feel afraid just amazed and happy it had came so close that i finally know what i had been really seeing.

it flew silently over the jeep and over my mom's roof very slowly huvering like and glided up into the sky over the trees and i couldn't see it anymore.

i haven't seen any since that day, but like i said it was an eye opening experience and very knowledgeable experience.

me and my boyfriend will remember it always it was his first believable experience now he believes like me.

the following day i found a weird black smooth looks like a rock i still have it i kept it. i found it on the table outside. kind of a momentum for the event and i think it may have dropped off the ship
it almost seems platic but it's defiantly not.
still not sure but i felt to keep it. like i knew it was special.

i have one other experience at my mother's years before i was a teenager when this had happened and a friend of mine had been there. i woke her up to make her watch and see what i was seeing she was sceptical until she seen it with me we watched it dance around over the lake for hours. it was a bright orange light it was way off in the distance when it was done i actually believe i seen it exit our atmosphere it darted off quickly strait (again like a space craft in the movies is depicted when they start up and travel at the speed of light...Sometimes i think the the movies aren't too far off on the way the present things at times) and when it exited a big  strait flash of light streamed across the horizon. and boom i even seen it grow increasingly smaller as it left earth. 

this was the other most amazing experience happened at least 8-10 years prior.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular space craft

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv with my boyfriend on the couch, actually a ufo show and my boyfriend suddenly blurts out, "hey speaking of ufos, what the hell is that in the sky"  referring to something outside the window behind our tv.  i stayed on the couch while he went to our porch to get a better look.   he yelled out for me to come see what he was looking at but i ignored him for a few minutes thinking he was seeing a plane or helicopter.   finally i got up to look when he said he was going outside.   first i looked through the porch window and saw the orange orb.  i thought, that must be a helicopter but then i realized it was like a fireball and looked to be pulsating so i went ouside to see better too.   we were both standing in our backyard, rural area so not much light pollution, trying to understand the light.   i noticed that it got bright then dull then bright and going slower than an meteor or comet with no tail, didnt have the standard blinking multi coloured lights of an airplane so suggested helicopter.  my boyfriend observed there would be noise at the distance it was and it was silent.   suddenly it took a sharp turn left towards quebec so westerly  and faded out.  we stood there for a minute looking at the sky, i noticed the cloud over where the orb came from was strobing white light.  none of the other clouds were doing this and it was faster than a searchlight or airport light would be.  we started to head inside again when another orb appeared.  same color same pulsating orange glow same flight path.  we went back to our garden to watch.  this one never turned but seemed to stop and hover at a point that seemed to line up over out neighbours house then slowly continued on again before fading out and disappearing.  about 5 minutes later a third one appeared and followed the same pattern as the second one.  fading out once it hit a certain point on the horizon.  we waiting outside still but never saw a fourth but did notice that the strobing cloud was still strobing but in a different location. neither of us felt scared or upset by this just intrigued and curious.  it didn't seem as threatening and the strobing clouds did. unfortunately i never took any pictures or video, i did think about it at one point but didn't think the pics or video would turn out. going to be looking again tonight just incase.
content.summary: Orange red orbs straight line ,  white strobe like lights in clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was on my drive-way in front of my house taking pictures of the setting sun. the sky looked particularly beautiful with the sun beams cutting through the clouds, so i took numerous pictures from different angles. it was only the day after while going through the photos on my computer, that i noticed the hat-shaped object in the sky. i never noticed an object in the sky while taking the pictures, and i don't remember being cognizant of getting any birds in the frame while shooting. in fact, i remember it being a clear and open sky - perfect for sunset pictures. analyzing this photo now, i feel certain that it is something mysterious and unknown. i feel like i snapped a picture of something that was supposed to stay invisible.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in photograph a day after photo was taken.

content.detailedDescription: I was about twelve years old. my mother was taking myself and three friends for pie at the local restaurant to celebrate our graduating and going into summer holidays.  it was later in the day as it had just turned dark. i was in the back left seat when it happened. we were exiting out of the trailer park when the car just stopped. our eyes were then drawn to the massively, bright object that seemed to be approaching out of the lake directly in front of us zooming towards us stopping directly above us. as i looked up i started noticing my feelings, my breathing and everyone elses as well. i felt fear and i couldn't breayh on my own. it was as though we were all breathing in sync with this horrifyingly beautiful object. i'm not fully sure how long this lasted but when it stopped it was as though we could breath on our own again. because i had the seat nearest the window,  i put my head out of the window. thinking about it then and all these years later i don't know what posessed me to do it. but when i did i was face to face it seemed with the inside of the craft. it was shaped like a small plane with hooked wings ( i've drawn it hundreds of times through my life) it had a glass or see through bottom. my eyes were focused on the buttons, lights and technology. it was like a cockpit of a plane but a thousand times brighter and countless buttons and lights.. as time went by i tryed to explain to my mom how it felt like it took pictures of my eyes because i heard and saw the lights change and heard clicking noises. i have no idea where it went or how..I do know it was gone just like that. the car started and within seconds all four of us kid's were crying and balling hysterically. as my mom drove the car around the lake towards the restaurant i remember looking out the window afraid that it was following.  when we got to the  restaurant my mom had the task of explaining to everyone inside why she had four young people in hysterics on her hands. years passed and i watched a movie i think it was "close encounters of the third kind" where the man's truck stopped. i then watched your program and realized it's not just in my head.
content.summary: A bright plane shaped object with hooked wings and a clear bottom flew up on top of our car. then what seemed like took control and pictures of us then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I woke up in the morning at 4:00 am, as i have been doing for many years.  this day in early july, i was looking at the sky with my binnoculars, at the stars.  it was just starting to get light out.  at 4:20,  a large, see through glass test tube shaped object was moving over the neighbours house behind us.  behind the neighbours house is the lake. i could see what looked like a light inside, but nothing else.  it moved at a slow pace.  as it went over the neighbours house, behind us, it went in between our house and the neighbour beside us.  it was about 30ft over the top of the houses.  i jumped out of bed and ran to the back door onto the deck to look around the corner of the house and it disappeared over the trees.  i them came back into the house and screamed to my husband to tell him about it.  i think back daily about this encounter...I told some close family and friends, but there are only a few that believe.
content.summary: It was like a see through large glass tube....There was a light inside. i was in bed watching  the stars with binnoculars about 4:20 in morning, and it appeared.  it was just starting to get light out

content.detailedDescription:
It was early september 1979 and i was playing outside with my dog and two sisters. there was no wind and it was nice and sunny with no clouds in the sky. i looked up and my eyes were drawn to an object far off in the sky far enough away it was hard to see but there was a long skinny silver shape pointed sharply on both ends just hovering and not moving. i watched it for a while and tried to point it out to my sister but from what i can remember i don't think she seen it. after quite a long time of watching it just hovering there silently i lost interest and went back to playing again because at this point i was only 8 years old.
later the same day late in the night somewheres around midnight my mother her cousin myself and two sisters were driving back home to amherst nova scotia. we were driving in an area called the boar's back when a bright light appeared on the right side of the car and seemed to move side to side up and down sometimes very fast and sometimes very slow it moved very sporadic and at times seemed to be within feet of the car. sometimes the light was hard to look at because it was so bright. this continued for a few minutes then i don't remember anything after that. i don't remember getting home that night. the third time i seen the bright light was december 24th that year it seemed to come out of the distance behind our trailer slowly towards us when we were getting out of my mother's car in our yard at 8 bayview dr amherst nova scotia then i don't remember anything after that. not even going into the house.
i also found 5 seed type things in my body many years later 3 in my spine one in the right side of my forehead and one in the webbing of my right hand.
i have carried those memories for many years and even today it seems like it was only yesterday
content.summary: 3 sightings. first, football shaped silver craft. second, large bright light with sporadic movements, third, bright light slowly moving closer. time loss

content.detailedDescription: Will explain if asked elsewhere
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Large round ball of light following our. movement ers

content.detailedDescription:
On father's day 2007 i was looking out my window and i noticed some lights where i know that there no lights like that. it was a smaller craft hovering about 20 feet off the ground. it had a shape like millennium falcon style with big red lights where you would imagine the engines would be. it slowly drifted out of site behind a building but hovering above it was a huge disk shaped craft with flashing lights on the dome area. it had to be at least 300-500 ft. across. i live near the international airport and am familiar with all types of aircraft. i was also exposed to military aircraft in afghanistan at bagram air base when i was there in 2009 during operation enduring freedom. 
i watched the craft hover in the same spot for over 4 hours. it would rise above the clouds so that only the bottom light was visible and then descend down below the clouds right beside a main highway. planes from the airport flew in front of the ufo and were dwarfed compared to it.
content.summary: Large disk with flashing lights on upper area and huge green light underneath

content.detailedDescription:
I was in our backyard star-gazing and listening to planes taking on and off from pearson airport.
one star which was never in that position was jibbling back and forth horizontally very far in the sky.
after about 5 minutes the light became stationary for 15 seconds then shot straight up into the sky with a trail of light vanishing into the background of stars. i noticed that there were is string of lift offs from peason international of planes.
i waited for 15 or 20 minutes by lying on the ground to see if it would come back but it did not.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like. continuous light

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine took this photo while on a hunting trip to fort st.John, bc. friends of his were to meet up with him at the hunting camp. the friends hadn't been to that camp before so he stopped to take a photo of the signs at the road where they were to turn. some time after he returned home, he downloaded the photos of his hunting trip. it was at this time that he first noticed the 'anomaly' in the clouds above the left hand corner of the signs he photographed. it appears that whatever was in the sky at that time traveled a considerable distance through the clouds in the space of time it took his iphone to take the picture. the object appears to have left a ribbon-like trail as it streaked across the sky and made a 'barrel roll'. very unusual.
content.summary: Mysterious object showed up in photo; object unnoticed at time of taking photo

content.detailedDescription: While driving along an unpopulated segment of a turnpike, myself and my passenger's eyesight both were drawn to a bright light in the sky directly up in the sky in front of us; suddenly it disappeared and suddenly reappeared to our front right at an alarming speed for the distance it covered; it disappeared and reappeared again to our front left; then it disappeared and reappeared directly to our left at treetop level.  the light emitted from it did not light up the ground coverage below it but was self contained. it was a soft glowing beautiful disk that seemed to float in its own cloud.  it remained as i pulled over to "behold" it.   my passenger on the other hand cried out from fear ordering me to close my car window which i had opened to gain a better view.  she yelled "hurry, i don't want to be beckoned!" which startled me.  she insisted i drive on and she started to cry because she had wet her beautiful dress pants and was terribly embarrassed and fearful. as i drove on, i immediately glanced several times in my rear view mirrors and twisted to turn around for another look and it had again disappeared as i saw nothing.  i felt it necessary to stop at the next turnpike rest area and report the sighting.  i attempted to do so but was told by the cashier before i had a chance to explain ... "oh, you saw a ufo... people see them all the time around here." so, we felt we were discarded and left.  we drove on to our destination and together verbally verified all we had seen and it was identical. we spoke of it only to one another over the years and our experience remained consistent and our feelings remained certain.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light in the night sky - ahead - right - left - then appeared close

content.detailedDescription:
It started around midnight when i went out to lock the shop in my back yard which faces south. i kept hearing a noise, like something dragging in gravel. i repeatedly looked down the driveway to see what it was. there was nothing there. that's when i looked up and seen three bright white and red rapidly rotating objects, hovering below cloud level. at first i could not comprehend what i was seeing. the bottom object was going up and down, and turning dull red as it drifted down then a static discharge could be heard, then it went back up below the other two and turned a brighter colour. this went on for about an hour. it appeared to me that the other two above it were trying to hold it up. it sank repeatedly, with the same noise when it went up. 
i have observed many things in the night sky, jets, satellites, meteors, planets, but i have never witnessed an event so bizarre. i continued to watch when i noticed a large orange object coming form the west at a low altitude, and speed. it climbed to a position above the other three objects and pulled the apparently troubled bottom orb into or beside it. 
at that point, the other two higher objects dropped in formation to a low altitude and headed east. the larger orange object dropped also and went in the same direction until i lost sight of them. 
just when i thought it was over, i seen another object speeding through the broken cloud cover towards the other four objects. it was so bright it lit up the clouds for hundreds of feet. 
at one point during this whole thing, a man walking in front of my house said to me, are you seeing this. he appeared to be scared, and bewildered. i said i had been watching this for over an hour. 
the next day my friends said that my face and neck were red. this is what i saw, and felt the need to tell people. in all the excitement i forgot to close my back door. it was open in the morning when i got up. 
it seems that i spend a lot of time thinking about this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 objects hovering low, one below the other 2, with static noise. fourth object hovered above the other 3

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling northbound on the interstate to work around 6:45am i noticed an object that was travelling behind a local factory which is located near the main river through town.  at first i saw it and thought, "oh it must be a helicopter landing at the local hospital" which has a landing pad just on the other side of the interstate i was travelling on. however, watching it because it seemed so peculiar i then realized it wasn't in the right shape of a helicopter, so i then tried to think of what else it could rationally be.  i looked at it and it had a body of an aircraft without the wings or the tail.  i compared it to a paper towel roll.  i could not think of what it could be that i know of.  i then realized i was witnessing a ufo.  it had red lights on either end of it which were solid.  it moved slowly over the interstate i was trying to get a good look at it but the morning was still twilight and it was hard to make out the details. it appeared dark in color like a dull metallic grey color.  i didn't see any windows or any other marks other than two red lights one on either end which were solid.  it hovered then appeared to be rotating on an axis and it lifted and started to go up.  it had almost a blimp-like movement to it.  it slowly moved off.  it didn't seem to be in a rush or cared that anyone was witnessing it.  it seemed as though it wanted to be seen.  it lifted and slowly headed off between the nearby hospital and a local college building.  i didn't have a camera on me and i was so amazed that i even tried to email a local news station to see if anyone else reported anything strange that morning.  there is no way i could have been the only one to have seen it that morning.
content.summary: Dark in color, like a paper towel tube, red lights on either end crossed over interstate after passing some industrial towers then hovered and rotated on like an axis then started heading off

content.detailedDescription: Just turned 12yrs, 10/12/1950. nov.1950, i was in my back yard when i noticed a strange looking craft that i never saw before.I always liked building model planes but never had seen any thing of this nature before. i was intrigued by its size which spanned w.Liberty ave, approximately 5-6 lanes wide and beyond each side of the highway. i watched this object hovering in place for about 15-20 minutes, never making a sound of any type.When i had taken the trash out to the back yard & as i turned around to return to my house, that is when i noticed the craft hovering very close to the highway. after watching for that amount of time, i ran into the house to get my dad to look at it also, but when we both got outside, it had disappeared.As years went on i realized what i had seen from other events i read about.I am now 75yrs old. at 12 years old,i did not read news papers, except for the comic section, so i am not sure if that incident made "the pittsburgh press" news paper. i certainly was amazed at the size, i knew this was not a blimp, i know/knew what they looked like!The time of day was dusk, just enough daylight to clearly make out the shape & coloring, still, to this day i am amazed as to what i saw. however,november, 1950, a major snow storm hit our area & shut down a big part of pittsburgh with over 3feet of snow. the evening i saw the craft, it was fairely warm, as i was not wearing a jacket.I moved from the area to a city about 35mi north called new kensington, where i also witnessed what was believed to be ufo's,several, do not remember how many, witnessed by thousands that day, in the 1970's doing what seemed to an aeriel show just shooting up-down in different directions at break neck speed. they looked more like white orbs, that late afternoon. the newspaper that ran the story was "the daily dispatch" or "the valley news". the paper had changed its name from the former to the later but not sure when. i do not have more detail on the 1970's incident, as my family saw this happen while on the way to a friends home to visit & as we told the story to our friends,they mentioned numerous airplanes flying in that direction.
content.summary: Extremely huge saucer shape w/lighting around center dark gray just hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was practicing memorial day weekend for the welll-known score off-road, baja 500 race to be held the first week of june. several americans were in my group. we were sleeping in sleeping bags on the beach n of. san felipe having practiced the entire day leaving from ensenada. we ate, and dozed off quickly. sometime about  1a.M. something  awakened me. i sat up and was shocked to see a silverish colored disc emerging from the sea of cortez.  it was bright because the moon was shining well enough for me to see the water dripping and glistening from the hovering disc.  i do not know why i was not able to alert my companions who were all still asleep in their sleeping bags. i tried to say something, but it were as if my tongue would not work. the object made no noise of its own. i could only see and hear the water dripping back into the sea. i am not sure why i was sitting up as the object made no noise, but something made me sit up. i clearly saw the disc and had several seconds of direct eye contact. as it hovered a few feet above the water. as i watched it took off quickly,  making no sound moving at an angle toward the nw. the object could only have been an ufo as i have not ever seen anything else like it. i was concerned as to why i lost the ability to speak. it was if i were paralyzed for a short while. i never said a word about what transpired during the night to my companions the next day. i was afraid of being razed severely and chose to be quiet. i was the only woman in the group. my all female race team faced plenty of teasing and joking as it was from all the guys. off-roading is primarily an all male sport so i kept quiet. now i am much older and i no longer care what people think. i know what i saw, and i recall it quite well..  the object disappeared so fast i knew it was not ofe this earth.
i will admit i was afraid, but since we were not bothered in any way, i did not feel we were in any danger.
content.summary: Disc emerged from the sea of cortez, hovered, with water dripping from it, paused and zoomed at a high rate of speed in a nw direction without making any noise.

content.detailedDescription: Since this time last year when we seen the triangle (we have video also)to now , he have seen countless numbers of ufo and best of all , my wife was video and pics of most of them
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We have been getting many sightings lately , day and night ,and my wife has videos and pic for proof

content.detailedDescription:
I was 4 years old. it was a late summer night,early morning, and i was sleeping. i was  wakened by a light in my bedroom. i open my eyes to see 3 to 4 beings surrounding my bed, and they were illuminated by these orbs that were appearing coming through my wall. i was paralyzed, i could not move. though, i felt at ease and was unafraid. the globes were glowing a bright white and they were passing through the wall, passing through my body, and exiting through the same wall as if on a chain or pearl necklace.
 i had forgotten or repressed this memory until i saw the movie starman. now i am 58 years old. i watch shows like hangar 1 and ancient aliens, and i believe it is time to tell my story.
content.summary: This happened in 1961. i woke up and saw 324 beings around my bed. orbs were coming through the wall passing through my body and out the wall as if on a chain.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were wanting to watch a comet shower that the news said was supposed to happen that night. we moved to the window and observed a red/orange pulsating/flashing orb coming in our direction. thought it was maybe a astri coming to the atmosphere and then it kept growing in size and abruptly changed direction to the right (west) and started slowing down in speed extremely. it hovered for about a 30 second period then disappeared into the tree line. after a couple minutes the trees began to glow. we started to walk out across the yard toward the light when the orb/light took off toward the sky in a 25 maybe 30 degree angle south and at a high rate of speed. after about 30 seconds the light became the size of star and stayed there all night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing red light with small flame trail became star size after coming close to landing

content.detailedDescription: Telepathic transmission of progeny.  long time contact. contacted you before with no response.  would just like to make a report while it's recent and fresh in my mind.  i made a drawing but i would prefer to give it to someone personally.
content.summary: Possible contiguous lifetime experience.

content.detailedDescription: Came out to go to school in college at the time and saw everyone across the street looking up. its was around 5:00pm and there was no sound, no birds, no air movement,and kid of a orange hue in the atmosphere. i saw the people across the street looking up and they pointed up for me to see. when i looked up i saw a huge silver white triangle the size of about half the city block hovering over the street and our house. it was about 200 feet right above us. this was a metal object and silver. it was very clear. it sat there for about 20 minutes... at which time i ran in the house to get a camera but couldn't find it and ran back out to keep looking. the object the shot upward with no sound and left a trail of white smoke straight up. never seen anything like this in my life and i was raised around airplanes. this was some kind of ship. i've seen them after this incident three other times. now i have pictures of the last ones.But they were different types of ships.
content.summary: Large triangle ship hovering over house and street

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was clearing out my computer of useless folders and files. 
2. i found a folder that i did not create within my computer, and noticed an image inside of the folder i had never seen before..
3.I did not know why the folder existed at all.
4.N/a
5.When i viewed the image i was surprised and intrigued. i had been watching the stars most nights and getting quite a few sighting of crafts around the time of the implanted image. so it felt like a sort of communication responding to my interest in ets. i have run the photo through a few tests , such as checking the internet for matches of the image to verify it's uniqueness. as well as running it through photoshop checking programs to confirm that it has not been tampered with. 
6.N/a
content.summary: I did not witness a ufo i received a photograph of an entity implanted onto my computer.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out for a smoke at about 8:30m on the 13th of aug. looked up at the sky to see if i could see any meteors.
as i looked up i saw a triangle of three lights passing just to the left of the house. it was not moving real fast like a plane but fast enough. it was going in a straight line.
i kept watching it,as it went to the west, then all of a sudden i then the three light go to 2 lights, one above the other. i did not see it move at all.
i did not see it turn. then it was gone. there was no sound at all. the lights were hazy or foggy looking. it was a definite triangle. no other shape was visible just the lights. 
i felt weird, not sure what that was and questioned myself as to what is had just seen. it was so real. i know it was not a plane as i sit and watch them every night, not a helicopter. 
i did nothing after
it disappeared. almost over our small airport, at least it appeared that was the in the area of the airport.
content.summary: Looked up to see three lights in a triangular pattern.They looked foggy or behind a cloud of which there were none last night. went across sky an  steady speed. then saw 2 lights as if it had turned one above the other and then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs around the block around 10:15 p.M. when i reached a corner facing north. ahead and slightly to my right, i noticed a plane-like pair of red/blue alternately blinking lights to the north in the direction of lake erie, where a thunderstorm was visible over the lake. cleveland hopkins airport is not too far to the east from here, so i am used to seeing planes each night, but this was clearly not a plane. these lights dropped down and then flew up to about 40 degrees or so and stopped, hovering. i watched for several minutes and then decided that this was odd enough to call my wife, who was inside our house about half a block away. she joined me at the corner and observed the rest of the event with me. at one point the red light appeared to switch off; now there was just a bluish-green light flashing. the object began moving again, first down and then to the left. then it moved up and started to grow fainter, as if it were flying out over the lake. the light disappeared; we assumed it had flown into one of the storm clouds over the lake. it reappeared briefly, flashing red and blue as it had at the beginning; it flew back into the cloud and was gone from sight for 10 seconds or so. suddenly it reappeared off to the right, and the blue light shut off and the red light began blinking rapidly. finally, the object dropped straight down below the tree line and disappeared from view.

as a mufon member, i am always scanning the night sky, and i have seen many planes and, occasionally, satellites. i have never seen anything like this. i can't discount the possibility that the lights were attached to a drone, but if so, it was moving erratically, hovering for long periods of time, and displaying a changing light pattern near a strong thunderstorm. lightning did flash behind the object multiple times during the sighting, but i couldn't see any shape silhouetted against the bright light.

i was not scared by the encounter, and the possibility that it might be a helicopter (i don't think so) or drone kept me from getting too excited, but i honestly don't know what this was. my wife was somewhat concerned because her first reaction was that this might be a plane or aircraft in distress. the dogs did not react in any way (aside from one yipping when the lights made a sudden maneuver and i stepped on his foot!)
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red/blue flashing lights moved erratically, then hovered. red light shut off; later both turned on and blue light shut off. object disappeared below tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the stars from our camp site. no city lights. stars were brilliant. i noticed an unusual light that was moving forward the back. it would move around in a sporadic patter. the center light was a white/red with a pattern of additional lights positioned at 2 6 and 10. from the center the pattern was blue light and then a white light. i turned and asked my wife to come out of the camper to see it and it was gone. here i was looking at it for nearly a half hour and in 15 seconds it was gone. this this a first for me.
content.summary: Center glowing white/red other lights set of 3 2 going at 10 o'clock and the other set at 2 and the 6. these were blue the white. it moved in various directions forward the back. i observed it for 20 min. i looked away and it was was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting out side with my work partner watching the meteor shower noticed a light moving 
singled to my partner told him what i saw and where it was he noticed it too we watched it circle and change colors was very high in the sky right above us we flashed a light at it while it was moving and it stopped then moved again noticed it go from whiteish blue to red then purple was very star liked in size then it moved again left to right stopped and hovered we were unable to capture it on cellphone camera
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved left right made large circles changed colors the hovered and did it again very high in sky
